name: Trivia Fever
overview: Trivia Fever is a game that can be played with or without your computer and combines knowledge, and individual or team strategy with a little luck. This irresistible Wizard of Trivia will revitalize your memory and test your knowledge while providing your friends and family with uncountable hours of fun-filled entertainment. Trivia Fever has something for everyone! With thousands of challenging questions in sever interesting subject categories and more on the way, Trivia Fever is sure to delight even the most casual trivia fan. When used with your home or personal computer, Trivia Fever not only keeps track of everything, it generates questions and answers and even allows you to handicap trivia experts to keep the game evenly matched.
